articles.author: Thomas Peipert
articles.title: Trump plans to deploy National Guard in Illinois, governor says - AP News
articles.description: The Trump administration plans to federalize 300 members of the Illinois National Guard, according to Democratic Gov. JB Pritzker, who called the move “absolutely outrageous and un-American.” Pritzker said the Illinois National Guard received word Saturday th…
articles.content:
The Trump administration plans to federalize 300 members of the Illinois National Guard, Democratic Gov. JB Pritzker said Saturday.
Pritzker said the guard received word from the Pentagon in the mor… [+2713 chars]
